Package anime.hanad.com.anime.ui.base

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BaseFragment.Callback  
    MvpPresenter<V extends MvpView>
    1 Create base mvp presenters and base mvp views 2 Create a contract for view and presenters 3 Let the fragment implement the mvp view 4 Let a new presenter class implement the mvp presenter
    MvpView
    Base interface that any class that wants to act as a View in the MVP (Model View Presenter) pattern must implement.
    SubMvpView
    Base interface that any class that wants to act as a View in the MVP (Model View Presenter) pattern must implement.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseActivity
    Created by janisharali on 27/01/17.
    BaseFragment
    Created by janisharali on 27/01/17.
    BasePresenter<V extends MvpView>
    Base class that implements the Presenter interface and provides a base implementation for onAttach() and onDetach().
    BaseViewHolder
    Created by janisharali on 24/05/17.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    BasePresenter.MvpViewNotAttachedException
